name: A Grimm Fairytale: Red Riding Hood
name_original: A Grimm Fairytale: Red Riding Hood
description: Little Red is the granddaughter to a powerful witch now settled in a forest during a time of peace. Things have changed however with werewolf attacks forcing villagers to call for the aid of the well-known hunters, Hansel and Gretel. It couldn't have happened at a worse time either as her sister has disappeared. She must now find her sister while not rising the suspicion of the villagers or hunters. Will her story have a happy ending or end on a tragic note.
